metadata.title: CVE-2021-23977 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Firefox for Android suffered from a time-of-check-time-of-use vulnerabilitythat allowed a malicious application to read sensitive data fromapplication directories. Note: This issue is only affected Firefox forAndroid. Other operating systems are unaffected. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 86.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
